answers.answer: Same here. I am a ftm and haven't had an ultrasound since 20 weeks, and right now I'm 35+6. I have also been curious as to whether or not my baby is head down, or of everything is okay because it has been over 3 months since the ultrasound. What makes it worse is that during my last appt I found out that I may have preeclampsia since my blood pressure was slightly above normal, so during my next appt they're going to run some tests to see whether I need to be induced. Is there any way you can request another ultrasound for your next appt?
The dr can tell at your 36 week appt if baby is down by the outside
^^^ wss. My Dr was able to tell without am ultrasound last week at 35 weeks. Just ask your dr if you are worried
Yup your Dr can tell when you start the internals. They'd only do an u/s at this point if they were concerned about size.
Your doctor feels your belly and knows. My doctor wasn't sure so she ordered for a quick ultrasound, and my baby girl is head down
My midwives just palate my belly. They can feel the difference between his head, back, and bottom.

Your doctor can tell by the position of the childs heartbeat... I just had an appointment friday and my doctor said my baby was definitely in position because her heart beat is at the lower part of my belly

My doctor has been checking at every appt. since I started my 3rd trimester seeing as she was measuring big not any more!..but he feels the little head from the outside she's been head down since 28 weeks..it has caused quite the pain in my pelvis :/
The way I could tell he was head down I felt is punches at the bottom of my stomach and his hiccups and his kick at the top on my ribs

question: Idk if my baby is breach or head downKind of nerve racking.I'm 35w 1d.Due Jan 28th.This is my second girl.Anyone else in a situation similar?
title: haven't had an ultrasound since 20 weeks
